ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: How often do guilds raid this area on your server?  Perhaps you can wait until another guild has begun a raid, have one of them give an alt of yours a tell
ygData.messageBody:
How often do guilds raid this area on your server? Perhaps you can wait
until another guild has begun a raid, have one of them give an alt of yours
a tell when they're in, then uncamp the bard and hope for the best.

Peace
Evulia, twink of twelve tunes, Tunare

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 10:33 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
>
>
> Last night we (my bard and his guild) were on a guild raid of Kaesora.
> Things were going great, when my ISP decided it was time to crash.
>
> So now I am camped in the middle of a dangerous room with no chance of
> running out. My guild is unlikely to be able to muster up
> enough force to
> get there anytime soon (we are small, we needed outside help
> getting this
> far). So what can i do? Any ideas?
>
>
>
